website_summaries.verdict: These refill bags are the best option for the Munchkin pail systems, proving to be durable and containing odor flawlessly.
pros: These bags do a fabulous job masking odor from dirty diapers, snapping shut to contain smells
Each bag fits between 30 to 40 dirty diapers
Bags are durable and will not rip when taking the trash out
cons: Bags are scented, which is something to keep in mind for those sensitive to smell

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper pail and liners
customer_reviews.text: One of the best decisions I ever made is getting a munchkin pail over one of the other brands. The liners are very reasonable they're a little harder to find in department stores but they're very worth it especially considering the fact that I can get them on Amazon. I highly recommend the subscribe and save. They're very durable they block the scent and they don't break the bank I've been using my. Munchkin pails for about seven years now and they haven't failed me yet! It was an excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Gina A. Marandino

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far our favorite brand. We ware parents to 4 little ones and used to have the diaper genie and with our 3rd we switched to the arm and hammer diaper pail and these refills make it incredibly easy without having to smell the diapers and love that they’re not the ones you have to cut!
customer_reviews.author: Brigette Christner

customer_reviews.title: Much better than off brand
customer_reviews.text: I love these the most out of any bag you can buy for the munchkin trash. I used server all of these boxes and decide to save money and buy the odd brand on amazon that are a blue color. Those bags did work and were a lot better value. However the smell of the diapers was leaking through those ones unlike these orange ones. I’ll be sticking with these bags from here on out. We are on our second child and hate the diaper stink in the room!
customer_reviews.author: Casberry

customer_reviews.title: just so you don't have to take out the garbage everyday? For me the answer is yes
customer_reviews.text: Is it truly worth $60 for the pail and $1 per bag for a specialty diaper pail system, just so you don't have to take out the garbage everyday? For me the answer is yes, because it's too hot/cold/muggy/whatever outside and I'm lazy and I hate the smell of old poop. I've heard you can DIY makeshift bags from regular trash bags, but that defeats the purpose of a product that only exists to eliminate the daily 2 minute walk from baby's room to the outside bin. Just buy these and embrace your laziness. Or use those extra 2 minutes per day to do something nice for yourself, mama. You deserve it.
customer_reviews.author: Lolabd48

customer_reviews.title: 😃😃😃😃😃😃😃😃😃😃😃😃😃😃😃😃😃😃😍
customer_reviews.text: These are a must! Will continue to order these for sure. Cant smell the multiple poopy diapers that are in it right now that used to stink up up the whole room from just one! Works 100% for me. Will def keep them in stock
customer_reviews.author: Salvador solis

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I use these refills with the Original Arm and Hammer Diaper Pail for 2 children in diapers. Much better than the tear & tie type. Easy to use and dispose of. Keeps the smell in pretty well. A little expensive but worth it. I would recommended this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanela5

customer_reviews.title: Hammer Diaper GOODS for babies I recommended to all my friend’s
customer_reviews.text: This product is good for mothers she can use easily Munchkin pail refill rings for babies. She was sometimes able to overfill the bag and the door on the diaper pail would open, releasing diaper stink. Now after using this thing is not coming. You can think this would be great to have while traveling, just use the bag alone and snap it closed in between diapers. Good purchase for the price and if you have a scented disk in place it’s fine.
customer_reviews.author: AMZ REVIEW

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love these diaper pail bags. Easy to use. I love that they are individually made bags. I also love that they snap closed after they full. That helps keep them from spilling out and keeps the smell down. Will buy again. Although the scent isn't as strong or long lasting. Recommend for easy and quick use.
customer_reviews.author: M&L

customer_reviews.title: Good for keeping the stench away
customer_reviews.text: We had gotten a Munchkin diaper pail with my first child but stopped using it before the second child came along (it had gotten hard to close). We still use the bags though. They really keep the smell contained. The only problems I've had with them is that sometimes when I stuff it too full, the top pops open on its own or it develops a rip when I pick it up. Both these issues only happen when I stuff it extremely full and not even every time it is overfilled.
customer_reviews.author: SBNB

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: The bags do a fantastic job at eliminating the odour from the diapers. And the bags hold quite a bit before you have to dispose of them. It's definitely a must-have IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Haywood

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a little over 3 months old, and I’ve been using the snap and seal rings exclusively so far. They have a nice scent, and they make changing the diaper pail quick, clean and easy. I will say that once she starts on solid food I may want to change the bag out sooner. What’s nice about the munchkin pail is I can always switch to the bag dispenser to allow for smaller volume change outs at that time. Overall, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: natawhat

customer_reviews.title: Smell? What smell?
customer_reviews.text: These keep the nursery from getting stinky from allllllll the diapers. Love how easy it is to change them in our Munchkin trash can too. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: stevie w

customer_reviews.title: Two kids later and still using these!
customer_reviews.text: Five years and two kids later, my husband and I are still faithfully using these bags! Unfortunately, one of our diaper pails didn't last so long, but we've never had complaints about the liners. I think we've only had 2 bag rips since we started using them, and both were pretty minor. The smell always stays pretty well contained (well, as much as possible!), especially once the top plastic seal is snapped shut. I have no point of comparison, but I'd definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Janine G

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement bags
customer_reviews.text: Everyone said not to get a diaper pale but we are so grateful we did. We use it every single day and it holds in the scent so well. These replacement bags are great. I will say we had trouble with the first ones we ordered because the plastic part that goes in the top was slightly bent so they were difficult to install and we have had a handful, about 3-4 bags rip, out of at least 60. I think it was just a bad batch. Fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Raynelle

customer_reviews.title: Get rid of the stink!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the stink to a minimum! Out diaper pail actually broke a year ago, but we just use the bags themselves, because they do such a good job keeping the stink to a minimum. The only other method we have tried is taking it out to the outside garbage can. These bags came out about 3 years ago (ish?). The ones before these were not scented and they were even good at keeping the stink almost not noticeable except when you have to open it. Now that these are scented, they are fantastic. We've had four kids and our youngest is now 2 and we've really been happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: BradleyB

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: The bad side of poop diapers is that they are stinky no matter what you do, especially if your husband has a strong sense of smell. These bags dont really prevent the stink but they do muffle it a bit. These are the best diaper pail bags we've found yet, though, so I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We had this system (although a slightly different pail) when my oldest was a baby. By the time we got pregnant again, we no longer had the pail but my husband insisted we get this same set up with the snapping bags. So easy to use! Just be sure you don't overfill the bags/pail as it will eventually break the pail- this is what happened with our first one. Controls odors well! And the bags are available on subscribe and save- bonus! My daughter is 3 months old and we change the bag about twice a week.
customer_reviews.author: KaileyMTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: but now that I don't have kids in diapers any longer they are great to use as bags for anyone who may get ...
customer_reviews.text: I had used these bags in my diaper pail when my kids were young, but now that I don't have kids in diapers any longer they are great to use as bags for anyone who may get sick on the go. I have a kid that gets motion sick at times and these are great to keep in the car. I love that they are compact, hold a lot and can snap shut to contain the smell until you can dispose of it. Not the intended use, but this is what I use them for now.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of boys

customer_reviews.title: They are expensive and you can only fit about 15 dirty diapers in a bag.
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 kids in diapers. These bags are a necessity. Yes, they are pricey, but I don’t have time or space to deal with the volume of diapers we go through unless they are contained easily. We have a diaper pail in our living room (I never thought I’d have a diaper pail in my living room) and using these bags leaves the room virtually odor free.
customer_reviews.author: MARGARET CROWLEY

customer_reviews.title: Bags now rip wish they had previous version
customer_reviews.text: I really am not a fan of this new version of these bags. Not only can you not get more bags for your buck but these rip EVERY time I have to change them. I even tried to change them sooner thinking maybe I was overfilling (you really know if you do because the pail won't close and never had this issue before). Just change a bag almost half full and ripped right at the top defeating the purpose and making the horrible smells escape! I have a steel can diaper pail for my other infant but I am so happy my toddler is almost potty trained so I never have to deal with this bag again
customer_reviews.author: JMS

customer_reviews.title: Incredible odor protection bags. Love it
customer_reviews.text: These diaper bags have an awesome ability to lock out odors from diapers. We have a couple different diaper pails but this one is the best for us with these bags. Our others wold have a slight odor but Not this one. The durable materials help keep the room odor free.
customer_reviews.author: Cantrech23

customer_reviews.title: Can’t imagine life without these
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely essential. Literally cannot imagine life without these bags because there would be diaper smell everywhere. Easy to use when your baby rolls off the changing table into a shelf full of diapers and then pees, and oh yeah she just rolled into her own poop too.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Amezquita

customer_reviews.title: Even better than the blue ones!
customer_reviews.text: I have the original pail and was ordering the blue Munchkin refill bags. But when they were no longer being sold on Amazon so I tried knockofffs by Neatbaby that were terrible! The smell permeated right through the bags. I even tried to double bag but the stench still seeped through. These orange ones are the new model of refills and are compatible with all Munchkin pails. They are even better at trapping in the smell than the original blue ones. They fit great and smell great! I will definitely continue to buy these!
customer_reviews.author: LCO

customer_reviews.title: Works well a little expensive
customer_reviews.text: Our family switched to this system after we broke the one we got for a shower. We really prefer it over the “Genie” system we had in scent control and ease of use. It does feel a little expensive but it does work well.
customer_reviews.author: chamber

customer_reviews.title: Really Controls odor
customer_reviews.text: I use this outside my front door for dog poopoo bags. It works great. There is no odor at all, even with two smelly poopie dogs. The only thing that would make it better is an automatic mechanism to pull the poop bag into the main container, versus having to stuff it through the opening. But I love that there is NO odor. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lupo

customer_reviews.title: Not the ring of bags!! These are singles snap bags
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression this was the ring of bags but I like these much more super easy! Instead of having to pull and cut the bags when full you just pull up, snap together and get rid of the waste.
customer_reviews.author: Dezzi Molina

customer_reviews.title: Works great, waaaay too expensive
customer_reviews.text: These work great however they are so expensive for 20 trash bags. We had this diaper pail with our first baby but for our second we just purchased a different diaper pail that can use normal tall kitchen trash bags because these become so expensive over time
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Chiaradia

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Pros - Easy to use. Clips to the diaper pail and clips close after use - thick plastic keeps everything contained - well made. I’ve never had the bags fail on me. - light scent to masks smells somewhat Cons - quite expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.author: Tori P.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy, not durable
customer_reviews.text: The worst bags you could ever buy! They brake while putting diapers inside. It’s super difficult to connect with the Pail, it’s not durable. I prefer the other ones that you could tied on the bottom. I’m really picky and I never leave reviews but these bags are worth leaving a negative review for the bad quality they have.
customer_reviews.author: Suri

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: I have a Munchkin Diaper Pail and seems like only this bags works. It is a bit pricey but can hold quite a lot of diapers. For my 20 year old daughter, I replace it every week. The bags have no strong plastic scent.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I learned the hard way not to buy the off brand of this product this is the best friend that you can buy it works way better than any other.
customer_reviews.author: Kandice Tice

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: We use this with the munchkin step pail and works much better than the longer version. Keeps the odor locked in as well. No scent. The lids clip together once you take the bag out and the odor remains sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Merlin F

customer_reviews.title: Good bags
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Munchkin step pail perfectly. Recommend just placing the poopy diapers in these bags and the pee diapers in your regular trash can to save space..and money since the price adds up easily.
customer_reviews.author: AusDarHam

customer_reviews.title: 1 box lasted 3 months
customer_reviews.text: 1 box lasted 3 months of diaper changes. We used the tub refills at first but we went through them much faster so we found these more affordable and just as user friendly. The lavender scent is refreshing and really locks in odors. We can't smell anything until we go to change the bag. Subscribe and save makes them an even better deal!
customer_reviews.author: RachelTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: There's no substitute!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. I fell for the video hacks showing cheap DIY ways to refill my Munchkin pail. Big mistake!! It's almost impossible to get odor out of plastic and these scented refills stop that odor...worth every penny. We've switched back and are staying with these. There's no substitute.
customer_reviews.author: Toni_J

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Been using these bags for a year now, they are great for keeping the smell out of the room and for holding a lot of diapers at once. The bags will break if you continue trying to stuff more diapers in than you should but that is completely the fault of the user (my wife).
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Make them more affordable!
customer_reviews.text: Great product a little difficult to install! Should be more affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon  shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Like It
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed having this brand. We don’t have real smelly diapers yet, but there’s been no odor at all. Bags don’t last long, so you definitely want the refills!
customer_reviews.author: jlavb

customer_reviews.title: Life changer
customer_reviews.text: These smell great, and are so much easier than the tie bags. I love that I don’t have to tear and cut like the others. Plus this pack is huge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading sale
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very misleading sale. You only get ONE diaper pail refill with this order. for this price it is not reasonable. Other websites give you an entire case of 8 refills for only double the price. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: alena

customer_reviews.title: Better than off brand
customer_reviews.text: I love these and they smell so good. Definitely will be buying this again. It blocks the odor really well. The only thing I wish there were more in them with how much they cost.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Bowden

customer_reviews.title: Does an amazing job hiding the horrible stench that can come from a diaper pail
customer_reviews.text: Does an amazing job hiding the horrible stench that can come from a diaper pail. The light lavender smell is not overwhelming at all! The plastic bag is thick and easily able to hold a good amount of diapers without ripping when taking the bag to the outside trahcan. Since purchasing these, I have purchased these another 4 times. From a mom with multiple kids, this is the best diaper pail bag out there!
customer_reviews.author: Real Housewife of Bel Air

customer_reviews.title: yellow +scented=unpreferred
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the unscented blue ones by this brand. The lavender scent mixed with dirty diaper smell is reminiscent of walking in a bathroom right after someone has sprayed air freshner after pooing... The mustard yellow is frankly ugly too compared to the blue. It does securely keep in diapers and with the pail it hides odors until close to being full.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole H.

customer_reviews.title: Lasts us 5 months use!
customer_reviews.text: I like how its easy to close the lid on top of bag coz its easy to hold and carry without tying it. Keeps smells inside ! A little bit of smell can escape but its not major ! Doesnt Rip either. One box of this will last us 4 to 5 months from our 2 year old that goes 3 to 4 diapers a day.
customer_reviews.author: No One's Here

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the smell contained!
customer_reviews.text: While it sounds like a lot of money for just a few bags, they hold a lot of diapers! Our one box has lasted us over two months. Wish it was a bit cheaper but they work great.
customer_reviews.author: S. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Smell is light but nice. Not cheap. Fairly easy to get them in/out of the diaper pail. My only complaint is that they are kinda small (Munchkin does make bigger bags, mind you) so you end up changing them out fairly often.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny S

customer_reviews.title: I like the conditional tie-off kind better
customer_reviews.text: Interesting. I assume the idea is that these are more convenient for you. Not sure if I am just so used the kind that you cut & tie off. But I think I'm gonna go back to them. Deed traditional kind certainly give you more wiggle room for when you have to change them. I feel it's more inconvenient to have to dig through Drawer to find the box of refills
customer_reviews.author: jason amanda wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Will continue to buy
customer_reviews.text: Just like the ones I get at the store. Bought them off Amazon for the convenience and will continue to do so. They work great at blocking out the odor and easily seal to block the smelliness of the diapers.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Kunkle

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent
customer_reviews.text: They work well. We were given a used diaper pail to use. These were the bags we needed. They do the job. You can't smell the dirty diapers. The bags scent isn't overpowering either.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: People tried to tell me that I didn't need a diaper pail because a trash can works just fine. This bag keeps me from smelling any dirty diapers. The diaper pail is in my bedroom and having not having an odor is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Quiel

customer_reviews.title: Quality made easy installation and removal
customer_reviews.text: These work great if used with the proper trash can. We’ve used these for a year without ever having any of the bags tear. Easy to install and remove
customer_reviews.author: Akash

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: These diaper pail refills are so convenient. They're easy to use and keep my baby's room from smelling like...well, diaper. The only issue is that the "scent" doesn't last nearly long enough, and the top does not stay closed if the diaper bag is on the fuller side. Other than those minor issues, happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kpres18

customer_reviews.title: Dislike the odor
customer_reviews.text: The only bags that fit our diaper pail but I wish they would skip the scent. These bags stink. The old version was unscented and help the diaper odor in. These smell almost as bad as the diapers. Luckily I cannot smell them when diaper pail is closed, just when changing it so I hold my breath.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Harness

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Kind of pricy given the volume they hold. I wish there were value packs or generic brands to compete.
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: Great at containing odor
customer_reviews.text: These do a wonderful job of keeping odors contained. They are a bit more expensive than other diaper pail brands, etc, but they work so much better.
customer_reviews.author: RKRushingTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Keep your nursery smelling fresh
customer_reviews.text: These are great and easy to use in our diaper caddy. We never smell the dirty diapers. I also like that the bags themselves don’t have an odor.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Makes our life so much easier. Cleanup is a breeze. Keeps things out of sight. And keeps the room from being stinky. Refilling is super painless and surprisingly mess free.
customer_reviews.author: MrsHReadsALot

customer_reviews.title: What a S--t bag !!!  Great product
customer_reviews.text: My ex uses these so I buy them for her. She seems to love them but me...I think it's a waste of money. Guess it depends on the person but I will say they are a durable bag and dont break or bust. And smells are kept inside.
customer_reviews.author: Justin C.

customer_reviews.title: Best baby shower gift!
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my niece for her first baby as a shower gift. Love the easiness of use and smell free with the baking soda inserts.
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz

customer_reviews.title: but a friend gave me one as a gift and I absolutely love this! No stinky diapers in the room
customer_reviews.text: So I never had a diaper pail with my daughter, but a friend gave me one as a gift and I absolutely love this! No stinky diapers in the room, or at least that’s how it feels like! Will continue to order, I can’t find this size package anywhere in the stores here, only small amounts, so this buy I sent more practical for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Perez

customer_reviews.title: I love the clips on the bag to hold in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I had the previous blue bags and these are the same bags just a different color and rebranded. I love the clips on the bag to hold in the dirty diaper smells and the trash bags do there job. I have filled them to the brink and they have not broken for now .
customer_reviews.author: Lidia Cebba

customer_reviews.title: Do the job!
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly and it is very easy to assemble. It is a bit expensive but worth the money. I used for my first child and I have already bought 3 boxes for my newborn
customer_reviews.author: Maibel

customer_reviews.title: Not a smell blocker
customer_reviews.text: They are great and easy to use with the diaper pail. Please don't expect it to contain nasty diaper smells, IT DOES NOT.
customer_reviews.author: Becky H.

customer_reviews.title: Bag won’t rip good product
customer_reviews.text: Very durable.. I just wish the install process was a little easier.. it’s not hard but there could be a better design and also emptying the bag isn’t easy.. I just end up cutting the top.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Not Air Tight; Bags Rip
customer_reviews.text: These individual bags are a great idea for convenience, but they fail at the most important jobs of a diaper bag: containing the stink and holding the diapers. The bags are not air tight - if you look around the edge of the ring where the plastic bag attaches to it, there are gaps in the plastic at the top. This means that the diaper pail seriously stinks well before the time that the bag is full and needs to be changed. Also, as noted by so many others, these bags consistently rip along the seams as they fill up, resulting in a very frustrating situation to say the least. Avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth H.

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty gross having dirty diapers spill all over your feet ...
customer_reviews.text: Awful bags! We've been using this pail for the past two years and never had problems with the bags. The new orange bags are an epic fail. Out of the entire box of bags, only a few were sealed along the bottom. The rest split right open just by putting my hand in the bag. It's pretty gross having dirty diapers spill all over your feet and floor. I've written to Munchkin and received no response.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I use my munchkin for doggie poo in garage. These bags are much easier to deal with than the roll!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Edgington

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: I needed to order these refills and did not feel like making the hike to the baby store. Came straight to my door in two days like always. I have not tried other products but I did notice that these bags are not the greatest at holding in odors. Most times when I have to take them to the garbage, i have to turn my head the opposite direction because of the stench that comes out. Also at about $1.00 a bag, they are a little expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Vee

customer_reviews.title: The best on the market
customer_reviews.text: The easiest diaper pail bags. No clipping and tying - just snap and go! This is our go to shower gift (with the pail, obviously). We love it and recommend it to everyone!! Compared to the Diaper Genie we used to have, the bags are less than half the cost and last twice as long.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley BradshawTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Great for trapping diaper odor
customer_reviews.text: We have been using these refills for over a year. We have been very happy with the quality and how they trap odor. We can usually get away with changing the bags after about a week or week and a half. When you change the bag the bag clips together and can be easily carried to the trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Jdole

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the poopy smell out of my room. If they made larger ones you could probably stash a body with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Clean easy and discreet.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the munchkin pail. Discreet and clean and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Switched to ring did not like & switched back to these. These are the best with the pail
customer_reviews.author: Srp6

customer_reviews.title: Love the lavender scent
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THEM! So glad they have the lavender scent! Best thing ever!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: It's okay, but going to try the continuous bag option next...
customer_reviews.text: They are just okay. They fill up quickly and I prefer the continuous bag option (giong to try the mama bear once these run out). There's no smell from these bags, so it's a positive, but I just don't like the design and the limited space in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use! Holds a lot and don’t have to worry about tying a knot in them. Doesn’t block the scent a lot but better than some we’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. I ran out of the first box I originally purchased (the blue ones) and I loved them. These ones are orange and the first time I fill one up and tried closing it the bag part that goes around the plastic ripped! I figured it was me that pull it too hard but today when I needed to change it it did the same thing again!!! The material seems to be not scratchy so it rips every time! Disappointed because I love my diaper pail!
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Santos

customer_reviews.title: Prefer these over the refill rings
customer_reviews.text: These bags expand outward which allows more dirty diapers and less trips to the garbage bins.
customer_reviews.author: LaMi

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my friends baby and she loved it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We have the Munchkin Step diaper pail and love it! My husband does not like the ring refills, so these are perfect. Just snap in, fill, and toss! Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Bryna Moore

customer_reviews.title: Hides dirty diaper smells!
customer_reviews.text: We order these diaper pail bags for our church nursery. They certainly do the job. Many comments on the fact they hide the scent of many dirty diapers. Durable and long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: The blue bags were significantly better. These seem to hold less and do not ...
customer_reviews.text: The blue bags were significantly better. These seem to hold less and do not "close" at the top, so the scent of poop lingers. I used to be able to go 5-7 days with the blue bags, now I need to change them every 2-3 days. I'm giving 3 stars because the lavender at first is a nice scent, and it is compatible with the pail.
customer_reviews.author: moonlightusa

customer_reviews.title: Masks the smell of dirty diapers
customer_reviews.text: These bags are the best at masking the smell of a dirty diaper. The slight lavender scent even provides a bit of freshness. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: mom of two

customer_reviews.title: The stink stops here
customer_reviews.text: We have a diaper pail next to our changing table. It gets full every 2-3 days. You can't smell the dirty diapers in the room. Then when it's full the top secures into a clamp and so far our garbage pail hasn't had a diaper stink either! Our newborn hasn't eaten anything but milk and they say solid foods can drastically change the scent of the dirty diapers so the bigger test on these is still to come!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these in my diaper pail for two kids worth of diapers. These keep the smells in and don't break. I'll keep using them as long as I have a child in diapers.
customer_reviews.author: StephanieC

customer_reviews.title: Munchkin Arm Diaper Pail Snap
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good product.. This is a fairly competitive price for refills. I love that they are Prime eligible and I can get them quickly if we unexpectedly run out. Make sure to find a good hiding place for the box. My infant/toddler loves to take the bags out of the box and then carry everywhere around the house :)
customer_reviews.author: S Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Product received not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The product received doesn't match the photo or description. I received unscented, blue bags. They're the correct bags for my pail, so I'm not upset at all. If someone were to purchase these for the lavender scent in the description, prepare to be dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa LaRose

customer_reviews.title: Great for stinky diapers.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my diaper pail. They keep the stench away and are easy to use. they also hold a lot of diapers.
customer_reviews.author: Rita M.

customer_reviews.title: Funk no more!!
customer_reviews.text: House no longer has that lingering pee or poop smell. I’ve used the bags with and without the pail and they still contain the funk!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Vanalstyne

customer_reviews.title: Easy to dispose! Great price
customer_reviews.text: These are strong bags that keep the odor in! I love that you can just clip the bag to seal it when it needs to go in the trash. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Best invention ever..
customer_reviews.text: Dont know what we would do without these!! They hold smell like you wouldnt believe. My son is currently in a size 6 Huggies and we can fit about 25 diapers per bag!
customer_reviews.author: RiMarkable

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: When we originally bought our diaper pail it came with a single roll of one giant bag. You had to use scissors to cut it for the length you wanted. It was horrible. Soon after we discovered these bags and never looked back! We’ve been using them almost two years now and think they’re great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these since my first child and love the scent and how many dirty diapers fit in one bag
customer_reviews.author: Jengo

customer_reviews.title: No longer the right size.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what happened, but these are no longer the right size. You can fit about 4-5 diapers in there before the container won't shut because it's "too full." The bag doesn't touch the bottom so it pulls and the container thinks it's full. Super unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This really is the best diaper pail system ever. I have two kids in diapers and they each have one of these. There is never any diaper smell in their rooms and the bags are so much easier to change than the roll style diaper pails. Love love love
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Goad

customer_reviews.title: I don’t use diapers it’s for my dogs pee pads
customer_reviews.text: At first I was like how the hell do I take this out and figured I had to rip the bag from the plastic part and still not sure that’s the right way but it does what I want it to do.
customer_reviews.author: David Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: These orange refills fit and work just like the blue ones
customer_reviews.text: We use the Arm & Hammer Diaper Pail in our church nursery. These orange refills fit and work just like the blue ones, which don't seem to be available any longer. Love the convenience and "smell control" that they offer.
customer_reviews.author: ChattaGram

customer_reviews.title: Good holder for diapers
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t guard against the smell but it helps carry all the soiled diapers
customer_reviews.author: Citlalic T Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper bags
customer_reviews.text: Been using them for about 3 years now. They work great, very durable and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: VR

customer_reviews.title: Easy and effective.
customer_reviews.text: These bags hold in smell and are easy to change out. Love my munchkin Pail design with these bags over the gross diaper genie double tie and cut and spill and stink design. This pail and bags r a dream.
customer_reviews.author: HeidiT

product_meta.title: Munchkin Arm & Hammer Diaper Pail Snap, Seal and Toss Refill Bags, Holds 600 Diapers, 20 Count
product_meta.description:
Size:20 CountBreathe easy in your baby's nursery knowing you have back up with the Arm & Hammer Diaper Pail Bag Refills. These 7 layer snap, seal & toss bags are made to fit all Munchkin Diaper Pails STEP, PAIL and the original Munchkin diaper pail. The lavender scented, odor busting duo of baking soda and self sealing technology keeps baby's room smelling fresh. Each refill bag holds up to 30 diapers and snaps shut, locking odors away allowing for a quick and easy toss no cutting or tying required!

BRAND STORY
By Munchkin
feature_bullets: Includes 20 disposable refill bags that shut tight with a snap
Just snap, seal and toss, no cutting or tying knots in the bags
For use with the Arm and Hammer Diaper Pail
